entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:21 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets. Ice pellets with freezing rain in the evening and after midnight and with periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
